attributes.additional_details:
To keep children of low income families fed appropriately. 
Make PM eat lunch of £2.10 every day
attributes.background: £2.10 per meal at the current food prices doesn't provide a child with decent amount of food. Most likely prisoners are getting more than poor children of low income families. This funding hasn't been reviewed for several years

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643288
